name: Frogger's Adventures 2: The Lost Wand
description:
Frogger's Adventures 2: The Lost Wand is an action-platformer game developed by Konami Computer Entertainment Hawaii. It was originally released in 2002. Konami published the game. Frogger's Adventures 2: The Lost Wand has a Metascore of 75, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Frogger's Adventures 2: The Lost Wand is available on Game Boy Advance.
